json.title: üõ°Ô∏è Fraud Detection Monitoring Dashboard
json.content: This workbook visualizes latency, drift, and business KPIs for the real-time fraud detection system.

json.query: customMetrics | where name == 'PopulationStabilityIndex' | summarize avg(value) by bin(timestamp, 1d)
json.title: üìä Model Drift (PSI)

json.query: customMetrics | where name == 'FalsePositiveRate' | summarize avg(value) by bin(timestamp, 1d)
json.title: üö´ False Positive Rate (FPR)

json.query: customMetrics | where name == 'FraudCaptureRate' | summarize avg(value) by bin(timestamp, 1d)
json.title: ‚úÖ Fraud Capture Rate (FCR)
